entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming north 30 early in the afternoon. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
